sentences: Isehakanud müürsepp on ise õppinud ehitama.
Ta on iseõpitud peremees ja teeb kõik tööd oma majapidamises.
Mingil alal tegutsev isehakanud spetsialist ei vaja formaalset haridust.
context: The word 'isehakanud' in Estonian describes someone who starts doing something without proper professional preparation, selection, or qualification in a particular field. It refers to self-taught individuals who have acquired their skills independently rather than through formal education or certification.
